name: DigIN Serialized Break Model
summary: Learn about .KNO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Break models organize data in such a way that information can be derived and extracted at any level of granularity that the user selects. Each break model can be analyzed at multiple levels of granularity and may be used to generate additional break models.
NOTE: DigIN stands for Digital Integration and is a registered trademark of EvREsearch. DigIN is no longer available.

description: A KNO file is a data file created by DigIN, a program used for information management and knowledge discovery. It contains a "break model," which classifies the information from a set of digital resources (documents, webpages, etc.) into a structure that allows patterns, relationships, and origins of data to be discovered. KNO files organize data by content, context, and structure, using a figure referred to as a Borromean ring.
